languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс молчит — так долго, что вам начинает казаться, что ответа вы уже не дождетесь.{/n} "Представь себе огромный корабль-тюрьму, заполоненный испуганными, озлобленными, не умеющими контролировать себя {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкерами{/g}, которых лишили дома и семей. Часть — дети и подростки, как я. Часть — чудовищные твари, лишенные права называться людьми, или психопаты, упивающиеся своими нечистыми силами".

traits.locale_text: "Это не то воспоминание, к которому я люблю возвращаться. Представь себе огромный корабль-тюрьму, заполоненный испуганными, оззлобленными, не умеющими контролировать себя псайкерами, которых лишили дома и семей".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix is silent for so long, you begin to think that an answer will not be forthcoming.{/n} "Picture a vast prison ship filled with frightened, angry {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} who can't control their abilities and who have just lost their homes and their families. Some of them were children and adolescents like I was. Some were monstrous creatures who no longer had the right to be called human, or psychopaths who revelled in their impure powers."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс молчит — так долго, что вам начинает казаться, что ответа вы уже не дождетесь.{/n} "Представь себе огромный корабль-тюрьму, заполоненный испуганными, озлобленными, не умеющими контролировать себя {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкерами{/g}, которых лишили дома и семей. Часть — дети и подростки, как я. Часть — чудовищные твари, лишенные права называться людьми, или психопаты, упивающиеся своими нечистыми силами".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for so long, you begin to think that an answer will not be forthcoming.{/n} "It is not a memory I enjoy returning to. Picture a vast prison ship filled with frightened, angry psykers who can't control their abilities and who have just lost their homes and their families. Some of them were children and teenagers like I was. Some were monstrous creatures who no longer had the right to be called human, or psychopaths who reveled in their impure powers."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for so long, you begin to think that an answer will not be forthcoming.{/n} "It is not a memory I enjoy returning to. Picture a vast prison ship filled with frightened, angry {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} who can't control their abilities and who have just lost their homes and their families. Some of them were children and teenagers like I was. Some were monstrous creatures who no longer had the right to be called human, or psychopaths who reveled in their impure powers."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for so long, you begin to think that an answer will not be forthcoming.{/n} "It is not a memory I enjoy returning to. Picture a vast prison ship filled with frightened, angry psykers who can't control their abilities and who have just lost their homes and their families. Some of them were children and teenagers like I was. Some were monstrous creatures who no longer had the right to be called human, or psychopaths who reveled in their impure powers."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for so long, you begin to think that an answer will not be forthcoming.{/n} "Picture a vast prison ship filled with frightened, angry {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} who can't control their abilities and who have just lost their homes and their families. Some of them were children and adolescents like I was. Some were monstrous creatures who no longer had the right to be called human, or psychopaths who revelled in their impure powers."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希沉默了很久，你甚至以为他不会回答你的问题了。{/n}“想象一下，一座巨大的空中监狱，里面装满了受惊、愤怒的{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}。他们无法控制自己的能力，刚刚失去了他们的故乡与家人。他们之中，有一部分是我这样的孩子；有一部分变成了畸形的怪物，已经没有权利被继续称为人类；还有一部分不过是一群疯子，陶醉于他们不纯净的力量。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for so long, you begin to think that an answer will not be forthcoming.{/n} "Picture a vast prison ship filled with frightened, angry {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} who can't control their abilities and who have just lost their homes and their families. Some of them were children and adolescents like I was. Some were monstrous creatures who no longer had the right to be called human, or psychopaths who revelled in their impure powers."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希沉默了很久，你甚至以为他不会回答你的问题了。{/n}“想象一下，一座巨大的空中监狱，里面装满了受惊、愤怒的{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}。他们无法控制自己的能力，刚刚失去了他们的故乡与家人。他们之中，有一部分是我这样的孩子；有一部分变成了畸形的怪物，已经没有权利被继续称为人类；还有一部分不过是一群疯子，陶醉于他们不纯净的力量。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for so long, you begin to think that an answer will not be forthcoming.{/n} "Picture a vast prison ship filled with frightened, angry psykers who can't control their abilities and who have just lost their homes and their families. Some of them were children and adolescents like I was. Some were monstrous creatures who no longer had the right to be called human, or psychopaths who revelled in their impure powers."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix guarda silencio durante tanto tiempo que empiezas a creer que no va a responder.{/n} «Imagínese una inmensa nave prisión llena de {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquicos{/g} enfadados y asustados que no pueden controlar sus habilidades y acaban de perder sus hogares y a sus familias. Algunos eran niños y adolescentes como yo. Otros eran monstruos que ya habían perdido el derecho a considerarse humanos y psicópatas que disfrutaban de sus poderes impuros».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for so long, you begin to think that an answer will not be forthcoming.{/n} "Picture a vast prison ship filled with frightened, angry {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} who can't control their abilities and who have just lost their homes and their families. Some of them were children and adolescents like I was. Some were monstrous creatures who no longer had the right to be called human, or psychopaths who revelled in their impure powers."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix guarda silencio durante tanto tiempo que empiezas a creer que no va a responder.{/n} «Imagínese una inmensa nave prisión llena de {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquicos{/g} enfadados y asustados que no pueden controlar sus habilidades y acaban de perder sus hogares y a sus familias. Algunos eran niños y adolescentes como yo. Otros eran monstruos que ya habían perdido el derecho a considerarse humanos y psicópatas que disfrutaban de sus poderes impuros».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは長い間沈黙を守っていた。あなたは、答えが返ってこないのではないかと思い始める。{/n} 「自分の能力を制御できず、家も家族も失ったばかりの、怯え、怒りに満ちた{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}でいっぱいの広大な監獄船を思い浮かべてほしい。その中には私のように子供や青年もいた。ある者はもはや人間と呼ばれる資格のない怪物のような生き物であり、またある者は不純な力を喜ぶサイコパスだった」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for so long, you begin to think that an answer will not be forthcoming.{/n} "Picture a vast prison ship filled with frightened, angry {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} who can't control their abilities and who have just lost their homes and their families. Some of them were children and adolescents like I was. Some were monstrous creatures who no longer had the right to be called human, or psychopaths who revelled in their impure powers."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは長い間沈黙を守っていた。あなたは、答えが返ってこないのではないかと思い始める。{/n} 「自分の能力を制御できず、家も家族も失ったばかりの、怯え、怒りに満ちた{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}でいっぱいの広大な監獄船を思い浮かべてほしい。その中には私のように子供や青年もいた。ある者はもはや人間と呼ばれる資格のない怪物のような生き物であり、またある者は不純な力を喜ぶサイコパスだった」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix schweigt so lange, dass du schon glaubst, er werde gar nicht mehr antworten.{/n} "Stellt Euch ein riesiges Gefängnisschiff voller verängstigter, wütender {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psioniker{/g} vor, die ihre Fähigkeiten nicht kontrollieren können und soeben ihre Heimat und ihre Familie verloren haben. Einige davon waren Kinder und Jugendliche, wie ich. Einige waren monströse Kreaturen, die jedes Recht verwirkt hatten, als Mensch bezeichnet zu werden. Oder Psychopathen, die ihre unreinen Kräfte mit wahrer Wollust einsetzten."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for so long, you begin to think that an answer will not be forthcoming.{/n} "Picture a vast prison ship filled with frightened, angry {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} who can't control their abilities and who have just lost their homes and their families. Some of them were children and adolescents like I was. Some were monstrous creatures who no longer had the right to be called human, or psychopaths who revelled in their impure powers."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix schweigt so lange, dass du schon glaubst, er werde gar nicht mehr antworten.{/n} "Stellt Euch ein riesiges Gefängnisschiff voller verängstigter, wütender {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psioniker{/g} vor, die ihre Fähigkeiten nicht kontrollieren können und soeben ihre Heimat und ihre Familie verloren haben. Einige davon waren Kinder und Jugendliche, wie ich. Einige waren monströse Kreaturen, die jedes Recht verwirkt hatten, als Mensch bezeichnet zu werden. Oder Psychopathen, die ihre unreinen Kräfte mit wahrer Wollust einsetzten."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix garde le silence si longtemps que vous en venez à vous demander s'il prendra même la peine de vous répondre.{/n} « Imaginez un gigantesque vaisseau-prison avec à son bord des milliers de {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} qui, en plus de se retrouver avec des pouvoirs qu'ils ne contrôlent pas, ont été arrachés à leur foyer et à leur famille. Certains n'étaient guère plus que des enfants ou des adolescents, comme moi. D'autres ne méritaient plus d'être considérés comme des humains tant ils s'étaient transformés en hideuses créatures, sans parler des psychopathes qui se délectaient de leurs pouvoirs impurs. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for so long, you begin to think that an answer will not be forthcoming.{/n} "Picture a vast prison ship filled with frightened, angry {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} who can't control their abilities and who have just lost their homes and their families. Some of them were children and adolescents like I was. Some were monstrous creatures who no longer had the right to be called human, or psychopaths who revelled in their impure powers."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix garde le silence si longtemps que vous en venez à vous demander s'il prendra même la peine de vous répondre.{/n} « Imaginez un gigantesque vaisseau-prison avec à son bord des milliers de {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} qui, en plus de se retrouver avec des pouvoirs qu'ils ne contrôlent pas, ont été arrachés à leur foyer et à leur famille. Certains n'étaient guère plus que des enfants ou des adolescents, comme moi. D'autres ne méritaient plus d'être considérés comme des humains tant ils s'étaient transformés en hideuses créatures, sans parler des psychopathes qui se délectaient leurs pouvoirs impurs. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix o kadar uzun süre sessiz kalıyor ki cevap vermeyeceğini sanıyorsun.{/n} "Yerini yurdunu, ailesini yitirmiş, kabiliyetlerine söz geçiremeyen, korkmuş, öfkeli {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}ruhsezerlerle{/g} dolu, kocaman bir hapishane gemisi düşün. Kimileri benim gibi daha çocuk yaşta. Kimileriyse artık insan demeye bin şahit ister yaratıklara, ettikleri fenalıklardan keyif alan psikopatlara dönüşmüş."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for so long, you begin to think that an answer will not be forthcoming.{/n} "Picture a vast prison ship filled with frightened, angry {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} who can't control their abilities and who have just lost their homes and their families. Some of them were children and adolescents like I was. Some were monstrous creatures who no longer had the right to be called human, or psychopaths who revelled in their impure powers."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix o kadar uzun süre sessiz kalıyor ki cevap vermeyecek, diye düşünmeye başlıyorsun.{/n} "Yerini yurdunu, ailesini yitirmiş, kabiliyetlerine söz geçiremeyen, korkmuş, öfkeli {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}ruhsezerlerle{/g} dolu, kocaman bir hapishane gemisi düşün. Kimileri benim gibi, daha çocuk yaşta. Kimileriyse artık insan demeye bin şahit ister yaratıklara, ettikleri fenalıklardan keyif alan psikopatlara dönmüş."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
